snippet: Unlike some sports of risk, including Alpine skiing, few concessions are made for women in snowboarding and freestyle skiing events like slopestyle.
abstract: Czech snowboarder Sarka Pancochova's dramatic fall during her second run at the slopestyle event is one example of messy collage of violent wipeouts at Sochi Olympics; most of the accidents have occurred at the Rosa Khutor Extreme Park, site of the snowboarding and freestyle skiing events, and most of the injuries have been sustained by women.
lead_paragraph: Unlike some sports of risk, including Alpine skiing, few concessions are made for women in snowboarding and freestyle skiing events like slopestyle.

headline.main: The Harder They Fall: Shared Slopes Take Bigger Toll on Women
headline.print_headline: The Harder They Fall: Shared Slopes Take Bigger Toll on Women
